'''Tuckborough''' was an old and important settlement in the [[Westfarthing]] of [[the Shire]], nestled in the [[Green Hill Country]]. A road connected Tuckborough with [[the Yale]] and [[Stock]] (with the [[Causeway]]) to the east.<ref>{{FR|Part}}</ref> It was the location of [[Great Smials]], the ancestral seat of the [[Took Family|Took clan]], the hereditary [[Thain]]s of the Shire.<ref>{{TT|III4}}</ref>

==Portrayal in adaptations==
'''2007: ''[[The Lord of the Rings Online]]'':'''
:Tuckborough is located directly south of [[Hobbiton]] and is the major cornerstone of the "Took country".
